attributes.action: Bring NHS education into schools, and promote healtchare professions to strudents.
attributes.additional_details:
With the NHS struggling to meet staff demands, and the impact this has on the provision of suficient care, the government needs to promote health-related job opportunities to students, and educate them on the NHS as a whole.

The NHS is a national treasure, and healthcare is a priority. In turn, it is paramount that we maximise awareness and understanding of the structure of the service, and opportunities available with in it.
